name: Conference System (Hybrid Data Model)
description: Demonstrates hybrid data modeling pattern combining embedded and referenced data based on access patterns. Conferences embed session details (always accessed together) but reference speaker documents (shared across sessions, updated independently). This approach balances the benefits of both patterns for optimal performance. Learn more: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/modeling-data#hybrid-data-models

queries.label: All conferences with sessions
queries.query: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.location, c.sessions FROM c WHERE c.type = 'conference'

queries.label: All speakers
queries.query: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.company, c.expertise FROM c WHERE c.type = 'speaker'

queries.label: Conference in Seattle
queries.query: SELECT c.name, c.startDate, c.sessions FROM c WHERE c.type = 'conference' AND c.location = 'Seattle, WA'

queries.label: Sessions by track (JOIN)
queries.query: SELECT c.name AS conference, s.title, s.track, s.date FROM c JOIN s IN c.sessions WHERE c.type = 'conference' AND s.track = 'Security'

queries.label: Sessions with specific speaker
queries.query: SELECT c.name AS conference, s.title, s.date FROM c JOIN s IN c.sessions WHERE c.type = 'conference' AND ARRAY_CONTAINS(s.speakerIds, 'speaker-001')

queries.label: Intermediate level sessions
queries.query: SELECT c.name AS conference, s.title, s.track, s.level FROM c JOIN s IN c.sessions WHERE c.type = 'conference' AND s.level = 'Intermediate'

queries.label: Speaker by expertise
queries.query: SELECT c.name, c.company, c.expertise FROM c WHERE c.type = 'speaker' AND ARRAY_CONTAINS(c.expertise, 'Cloud Security')
